name: Squirtle

attack_list.name: Bubble
attack_list.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed

attack_list.name: Withdraw
attack_list.text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to Squirtle during your opponent's net turn. (Any other effects of attacks still happen.)

description: After birth, its back swells and hardens into a shell. It powerfully spray foam its mouth.
